snippet: Mark Zuckerberg denounced remarks by Mr. Andreessen on Twitter that Indians were being shortsighted by banning Facebook’s Free Basics project.
abstract: Venture capitalist Marc Andreessen defends Facebook's Free Basics initiative that is aimed at poorer people in countries like India, saying nation's ban of service is shortsighted; Facebook disavows his comments.
lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg denounced remarks by Mr. Andreessen on Twitter that Indians were being shortsighted by banning Facebook’s Free Basics project.

headline.main: Marc Andreessen Apologizes After Facebook Disavows India Comments
headline.print_headline: Facebook Disavows Andreessen’s Comments on India
